summary: HBO is an American TV network that started in 1972, making it the oldest subscription TV service in the U.S. It offers movies, original shows, and specials without ads. HBO was the first to use satellites for TV and introduced the idea of "premium channels" with extra fees. Now, it's part of Warner Bros. Discovery and has seven channels. You can watch HBO through cable or streaming on platforms like Hulu and YouTube TV. It has over 35 million subscribers in the U.S. and is available in many countries worldwide.
title: HBO
